name: html-css
description: `git innt` -- bat dau. `git status` -- check project new. `git add` -- add file. `git commit -m''` -- dong goi, gian ten mo ta. `git log` -- check History da `git commit`. `git show` --check da thay doi. `git diff` 'different' -- xem noi dung code file co modifled.  `q`--thoat. `working directory` --Thu muc dang lam viec. `staging area`-- khi commit cac file dang thay doi o `git repository` --luu cac thay doi trong cac `commit  ` `staging area` sang `git repositort` `gitk` --mo cua so gd user. `git checkout` -- xoa bo  code thay doi vua tao moi co trong modifled  file `git reset ` -- nguoc voi  `git add` `git branch -b <branch> (branching)` --tao nhanh moi thoat nhanh hien tai `git branch` kiem tra dang o nhanh nao. `git checkout <branch>` -- quay tro lai branch `git merge ` -- keo thay doi tu nhanh sang nhanh can thay doi --1.git chechout a. --2.`git merge <branch>` b. `git branch -D <branch>` -- delect branch
